00125         // section -64--88-0-106-2491d050:10f14453553:-7ffb begin
00126                                 $types = array();
00127                                 
00128                                 $tps = $this->srv->client->__getTypes();
00129                                 foreach($tps as $t)
00130                                 {
00131                                         if(preg_match('#struct (\w+) {#', $t, $matches))
00132                                         {
00133                                                 $typename = $matches[1];
00134                                                 $types[$typename] = array();

00136                                                 foreach($tmp as $row)
00137                                                 {
00138                                                         if(preg_match('#^ \w+ (\w+);$#', $row, $matches))
00139                                                         {
00140                                                                 $types[$typename][] = $matches[1];
00141                                                         }
00142                                                 }
00143                                         }
00144                                 }
00145                                 
00146                                 $fcn = $this->srv->client->__getFunctions();
00147                                 foreach($fcn as $f)
00148                                 {
00149                                         if(preg_match('#\w+ (\w+)\((\w+) \$\w+\)#', $f, $matches))
00150                                         {
00151                                                 $this->functions[$matches[1]] = array('params' => array_flip($types[$matches[2]]));
00152                                         }
00153                                 }
